original_title: Big Scream TV! The Boo Tube! Volume 1
overview: Project haunted hologram illusions on your television with this Big Scream TV! The Boo Tube Vol. 1. The scare DVD brings the dead alive on your television. The DVD video features include: a Tame Version (less frightening material intended for younger viewers), an Un-Tame Version (all hell breaks loose! includes Tame material), and Scary How-To Tips (learn how to make a head float mid air and ways of using DVD). Create a spooky visual wallpaper or ambient background on your television for your Halloween decor with this Big Scream TV! The Boo Tube Vol. 1.
tagline: Turn any size TV into a Monster Machine!
title: Big Scream TV! The Boo Tube! Volume 1
